title: Data Pipeline Automation for Hospital Rate Sheets
description: Automated data pipeline to extract and standardize hospital rate sheet data from hundreds of unique PDFs, cutting manual processing time by 60%. Document classification system, custom parsing, and reusable algorithms for onboarding new formats. Sole developer, working directly with IBM and client teams.
highlights: Automated testing for high code quality

title: AI for Safety Document Automation
description: Web tool using AI to scan, analyze, and summarize safety PDF reports, reducing manual review time by 50%. Features include Azure OCR, vector database storage, and AI-powered safety reports. Built React app for editing and chatting with AI about safety documents.
highlights: Integrated Azure OCR and vector database

title: Regulatory Compliance Chatbot (Azure GenAI POC)
description: AI-powered chatbot for PG&E to search and cross-check claims and regulatory documents, cutting compliance review time by 50%. Backend pipelines for document indexing, advanced search, and real-time Q&A features.

title: AI Contract Review Proof of Concept
description: Microsoft Word plugin using AI to suggest contract edits and highlight key issues, speeding up legal review by 40%. Angular dashboard for contract management and real-time redlining suggestions inside Word.

title: AI Book Search & Recommendation Platform
description: AI-powered search tool for marketing teams to find and recommend books by topic, event, or person. Backend pipeline to process and vectorize book data, automated extraction of key book details, and smart recommendations using GPT-4 and metadata filters.
highlights: Automated extraction of key book details

title: Nurse Staffing Platform
description: Web app for hospitals to post shifts and for nurses to search and book jobs nationwide. Improved job search speed, advanced filters, and reliable booking features. Used Redux, Redux-Saga, and automated tests for robust state management.
highlights: Improved nurse job search speed by 25%

title: Credentialing Portal Project
description: React-based admin portal automating credential checks for nurses, covering state and hospital rules. Real-time dashboards, streamlined credential management, and automated regression tests for safer updates.

title: Pines Cabin Rentals Website
description: Custom website for vacation rental business in Big Bear. Booking system with payment processing, calendar integration, and SEO best practices. Managed customer service and communication.

title: Del Sol School Website & IT
description: Developed and maintained the school's website using WordPress. Managed computers, network infrastructure, and provided technical support. Helped school become a Google for Education partner.
